step_feedback.feedback: For step 1, you are doing a good job of keeping your arm overhead. Focus on feeling the resistance as instructed.
For step 2, you are opening your palm and fingers wide. Continue to focus on this movement.
For step 3, you are making a fist and tightening your muscles while inhaling. This is great!
For step 4, you are opening your hand and relaxing your muscles while exhaling. Ensure you are visualizing fluid being pumped out.

exercise_summary: You're doing great with the overhead pumping exercise! Remember to stretch your arm overhead and feel the resistance. Open your hand wide, then make a fist while breathing in, and open your hand again while breathing out.
